text.tubion.settings.title: Tubion Settings
text.tubion.settings.lobby.title: Lobby
text.tubion.settings.lobby.hideDuplicate: When you join a lobby, the welcome message might pop-up again.
text.tubion.settings.lobby.betterNpcMess: Improves the NPC Messages in the lobby by removing whitespace.
text.tubion.settings.lobby.hideTips.tool: Hides "Did you know" messages from the chat.
text.tubion.settings.lightStrike.title: Light Strike
text.tubion.settings.lightStrike.broadSw: Adds back the enchantment glint for the broad sword, removed in patch #3.
text.tubion.settings.battleRoyale.title: Battle Royale
text.tubion.settings.battleRoyale.hideWo:
Hides the annoying message when you try to pick up other
blocks when you have already reached the limit
text.tubion.settings.discord.title: Discord
text.tubion.settings.discord.enableRPC.t: Discord Rich Presence allows your friends to see what you are playing.
text.tubion.settings.tubnet_tweaks.title: Visuals
text.tubion.settings.tubnet_tweaks.enabl: Automatically injects Tubnet Tweaks when joining TubNet
text.tubion.settings.tubnet_tweaks.custo: Turns the resource reloading screen background to blue when joining TubNet
Changes the Title Screen's panorama to a TubNet-themed one.
text.tubion.settings.tubnet_tweaks.compa: Cleans up chat by stacking duplicate messages. Ported from Sk1er's 1.8.9 mod.
text.tubion.settings.qol.title: Quality-Of-Life
text.tubion.settings.qol.autogf.tooltip:
Automatically say "glhf" in chat when a game starts.
Ported from Sk1er's 1.8.9 mod.
text.tubion.settings.qol.autogg.tooltip:
Automatically say "gg" in chat when a game ends.
Ported from Sk1er's 1.8.9 mod.
